content: the flower petal prayer shawl crochet pattern is a beautiful and comforting triangle shawl designed to wrap someone in warmth and love this pattern pairs perfectly with the flower petal cap and is part of the crochet along for a cause a summer-long event focused on crafting handmade items for those in need whether you re making it as a gift of encouragement or donating to a cancer center or shelter this shawl offers both style and heartfelt comfort materials 300g worsted weight yarn i used i love this yarn in soft pink i/5 5 mm yarn needle scissors level easy+ approx finished size 35 x 35 46
